data.title: Richard Donner: Movies, Photos, Videos, News, Biography & Birthday
data.meta_description: Richard Donner: Check out the list of all Richard Donner movies along with photos, videos, biography and birthday. Also find latest Richard Donner news on Times of India.
data.text:
'The Omen' prequel 'The First Omen' to release on this date

ANI / Nov 17, 2023, 18:14 (IST)

A prequel to it is now all set for release in theatres on April 5, next year.

'The Man in the High Castle' actor Jack Kehler passes away at 75

ANI / May 10, 2022, 12:22 (IST)

Jack Kehler, a character actor in The Big Lebowski and The Man in the High Castle, has passed away. He was 75.

Hollywood fraternity mourns demise of legendary filmmaker Richard Donner

ANI / Jul 06, 2021, 14:38 (IST)

The sudden news of filmmaker Richard Donner's demise has shattered the whole Hollywood industry, following which heartfelt tributes are pouring in for the late star.

Mel Gibson and Mark Wahlberg's 'Flight Risk' release date out

ANI / May 21, 2024, 13:30 (IST)

The release date for the Mark Wahlberg-led film 'Flight Risk' has been unveiled. Directed by Mel Gibson, the thriller is set to hit theaters on October 18, 2024. 'Flight Risk,' produced by Lionsgate, promises an intense aviation thriller experience. Wahlberg, alongside Michelle Dockery and Topher Grace, stars in the film, which follows a pilot (Wahlberg) transporting an Air Marshal (Dockery) and a fugitive (Grace) through the Alaskan wilderness en route to a trial. Penned by Jared Rosenberg, the movie counts Gibson among its producers, alongside John Davis and John Fox for Davis Entertainment, as well as Bruce Davey.

Epic battle at the box office: 'Godzilla x Kong' vs. 'Monkey Man' vs. 'The First Omen'

etimes.in / Apr 06, 2024, 14:45 (IST)

'Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire' dominates with a projected $25M-$28M in its second weekend, grossing $100M with a $103.3M debut. Dev Patel's 'Monkey Man' opens strong at $10.5M, while 'The First Omen' aims for $8M-$10M. 'Ghostbusters: Frozen Empire' and 'Kung Fu Panda 4' maintain steady performances amidst fierce box office competition.

'Godzilla x Kong' maintains box-office dominion in second consecutive weekend; Dev Patel's 'Monkey Man' scores $10 million opening

AP / Apr 08, 2024, 05:21 (IST)

"Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire" dominated the box office for the second week, grossing $31.7 million. The MonsterVerse film has earned $361.1 million worldwide in two weeks, surpassing its predecessors. Meanwhile, Dev Patel's "Monkey Man," packed a punch with an impressive $10.1 million opening weekend.

Oscars 2022: Lata Mangeshkar, Dilip Kumar left out of 'In Memoriam' segment

PTI / Mar 28, 2022, 11:43 (IST)

Melody queen Lata Mangeshkar and cinema veteran Dilip Kumar were missing from the 'In Memoriam' segment at the 94th Academy Awards. The absence of two of Indian cinema's giants from the 2022 Oscars ceremony was a glaring one, especially after the British Academy Film and Television Awards (BAFTA) honoured Mangeshkar and Kumar earlier this month.
